body:
How this game works- in 1 sentence describe as best you can a map from Nebula or The Nexus games (as these are the most popular game modes) and the person below will have to guess the name of the map.
Rules- Please don't use old maps that are no longer on the server as some players will not know about them. Also please don't spam (It's the most annoying thing a discussion can have...)

Example- This map is played on Nebula and consists of 4 monuments around a circular spawn, it was once a CTW and has red and blue teams.

title: [GAME] Guess the map

replies.body: Why dont you do guess the map based on an image? i think it would be more fun.
